11  class Singleton
12  {

14  Singleton(const Singleton&) = delete; // to prevent CASE 3

16  Singleton() noexcept = default; // to allow creation of Singleton<Foo>
17  // by the derived class Foo, since otherwise the (deleted)
18  // copy constructor prevents the compiler from generating
19  // a default constructor;
20  // declared protected to prevent CASE 5
